itunes:title: Episode 327 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/09/18 - Live From Penn State!

itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway rented and RV last week to tailgate live from Penn State sponsored by Stateside Vodka with the Western PA Drinkin' Bros Chapter and have them on the show.  They also make their picks for the upcoming College Football and N...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway rented and RV last week to tailgate live from Penn State sponsored by Stateside Vodka with the Western PA Drinkin' Bros Chapter and have them on the show.  They also make their picks for the upcoming College Football and NFL games for the week as well as talk about the madness of the Mcgregor/Khabib which they were at.
